data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of West Kurdufan against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West Kurdufan, Sudan

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to West Kurdufan, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of West Kurdufan to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in West Kurdufan with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Sherifi people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Sherifi people know you.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of West Kurdufan, Sudan to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 1,124 believers in West Kurdufan to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.section_summary:
the state of West Kurdufan, Sudan has a population of 290,400.

We estimate West Kurdufan has 1,124 people who might know Jesus, 13,353 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 275,923 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 258 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of West Kurdufan, Sudan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
